verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa upavāsī tāhāṅi rahilā
āra dine duḥkhī hañā nīlācale āilā

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; upavāsī—fasting; tāhāṅi—there; rahilā—remained; āra dine—on the next day; duḥkhī—unhappy; hañā—becoming; nīlācale—to Jagannātha Purī; āilā—returned.
translation: All the devotees remained there and fasted, but the next day they all unhappily returned to Jagannātha Purī.
